app.title: Madinah Hackathon Registration Platform
app.description: Register for the biggest hackathon in Madinah!
app.registration_success: Your registration has been received. We will contact you soon.
app.step1: Your application will be reviewed by the organizing team
app.step2: You will receive a notification via email when your application is approved
app.step3: Additional details about the event and schedule will be sent
app.hero_subtitle: Join the biggest hackathon in Madinah and participate in developing innovative technical solutions
app.about_description: A distinguished technical event that brings together developers, designers, and innovators from all over the Kingdom to develop innovative technical solutions that serve society and develop the digital economy.
app.faq1_question: Who can participate in the hackathon?
app.faq1_answer: Developers, designers, and entrepreneurs of all ages can participate, either individually or as a team.
app.faq2_answer: The participant must be 16 years or older and have experience in technology or design.
app.faq3_answer: No, participation is completely free. Food and drinks will be provided throughout the hackathon.
app.faq4_answer: Total prizes reach 100,000 Saudi Riyals, in addition to job opportunities and strategic partnerships.
app.cta_subtitle: Register now and be part of the biggest hackathon in Madinah
app.target_audiences_gov_desc: Includes ministries, authorities, and government institutions seeking to develop their digital services.
app.target_audiences_pro_desc: Developers, designers, entrepreneurs, and anyone passionate about tech innovation.
app.target_audiences_students_desc: University and institute students and fresh graduates seeking to develop their technical skills.

form.terms: I agree to the terms and conditions
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

admin.goal1_title: Enhancing Strategic Directions for Digital Transformation
admin.goal1_desc: Supporting innovation in digital services and achieving an integrated digital environment.
admin.goal2_desc: Implementing emerging technologies according to national standards.
admin.goal3_desc: Promoting innovation and engagement with beneficiaries.
admin.goal4_desc: Expanding experts' horizons and applying pioneering ideas.
admin.goal5_desc: Engaging local entities to serve the Emirate's goals.
admin.goal6_desc: Empowering innovators and improving social impact.
admin.goal7_desc: Promoting a culture of innovation and engagement with beneficiaries.
admin.goal8_desc: Increasing digital presence and connecting them with entrepreneurs.
admin.timeline_step1_subtitle: Participants begin by submitting an introductory video about themselves and their proposed idea.
admin.timeline_step2_subtitle: All submissions are evaluated, and 12 teams from each track are qualified to move to the second round.
admin.timeline_step3_subtitle: Qualified teams attend 3 specialized workshops to help develop their ideas, followed by preparing a detailed presentation about their proposed solutions.
admin.timeline_step4_subtitle: After presentations, the top 5 teams from each track are selected to qualify for the final stage.
admin.timeline_step5_title: Prototype Development and Final Presentation Phase
